message.body: Did you write it?!?
Hey! I outlined it like 75% done. Pre act 3 is hard. It's about a barley 18 yo who has to take care of her mom after a bad car accident
My friend Anna and I are working on one about a guy and a girl that meet on a plane BUT it's about how there's more than meets the eye
ï¿¼
Also I have to share with someone. Was Internet stalking the guy I love and found this today. Lol.
Whoa! (Can the plane film be like that bridesmaids scene)
That picture! OMG!
Ha that's a good idea. The premise is she's small town never been in a plane. Nervous. He's city boy. But you find out he's only been with one girl and she's kinda experienced.
So there's a airport hotel sex scene haha
Yessssss. Love it. I'd watch the shit outta that!
Thanks we both love strong female roles so it could be good. She got cast in a national commercial too so she needs to start writing
Isn't that picture amazing? I love him so much. I broke down and said I was harsh cuz u hurt me. All u had to do was ask.
What did he say!?
He hasn't been online.
I think he was off. I'm sure I'll never hear from him again
You gotta speak yr mind! Specially if it's bugging you.
Yeah that's how I felt. If I got hit by a bus tomorrow at least he knows haha
Yup. That's how I feel.
It's out there in the world and he cam do with it what he will.
How r u
I admire how you speak your mind. I need to Do that more! I'm good!! Got lots of work travel in the next two months
Ha thanks. I'm glad to hear that cuz when I typed I would move there if you wanted I felt silly but it's true. Where are you going?????
That is awesome. Are you excited for richmond
Oh girl I feel that!!!
Big time ha
Eh I'm having social anxiety because all the people I know.
Free plane and hotel so oh well
It could be fun. You can call me if you get anxious.
The big festival starts this weekend so I'm hopping to meet some cuties.
And I'm gonna dye my hair purple
You are gonna meet so many hotties. Get some digits! All your hair or just a little
Maybe all?
Do it! Sea punk for life!
Haha yesssssss u get me
